msg: Win32: Avoid busy wait which consumes 100% of the CPU when all the worker

author: wrowe
msg: Brad, Stas, I presume these patches were first committed to 2.1-dev.
Please keep the CHANGES logs in sync!

author: wrowe
msg: Enhance the behavior of mod_isapi's WriteClient() callback to
provide better emulation for isapi modules that presume that the
first WriteClient() call may send status and headers.  An example
of WriteClient() abuse is the foxisapi module, which relies on
that assumpion and now works.  Regressions on various example isapi
modules don't reveal any new issues.  [May fix PR16637]

author: bnicholes
msg: Since NetWare doesn't have processes the entire issue of having to close
handles before an exec is non-existent.  So just bypass the close on exec
